Our Clinics

Cardioology

Heart ultrasound examination through the esophagus, Coronary artery bypass graft, Catheterization of coronary arteries, Balloon catheter,Heart attack.

Gastroenterology

Treatment of diseases of the digestive system and liver, follow-up diabetics and blood pressure.Treatment of endocrine and hormonal disorders .

Otolaryngology

Ear and hearing disorders including ear infection and pain, ear pressure, hearing problem, tinnitus and dizziness, inner ear examination.

Dental Care

Orthodontics, root treatment, dental implants, tooth extractions, dental implants, cosmetic dentistry, nerve treatment and dental filling .

Gynecology

For prenatal care, postpartum care, fetal evaluation,Laparoscopy, normal delivery, cesarean delivery .

Psyctiatry

Allergic contact dermatitis and of other causes, skin disorders causing inflammation such as psoriasis, skin infections, genetic skin diseases, such as vitiligo. .

Orthopaedy

Bone tumors (muscle and bone tumors), treatment of peripheral nerve disorders, metabolic bone diseases: including osteoporosis or diseases that reduce bone mass, bone trauma .

Pediatric

Baby feeding, Infectious diseases of children, Diseases of children's lungs, Allergy pediatric immunologist, Pediatric endocrinology, Pediatric heart disease .

Ophthalmology

Comprehensive vision testing and eye examination services, treatment and surgery,Fitting for contact lenses and eyeglasses.
